channel.title: How do I change the exp rate of my stats?
channel.description: How do I change the exp rate from 1 hit = 50 str to 1 hit = 90 str? Just tell me what to search and I'll find out the exp amount.

item.title: How do I change the exp rate of my stats?
item.dc:creator: @tonypker13 tonypker13
item.description:
@tonypker13 wrote:

Already did, I’ll go check for replies.

Read full topic
item.source: How do I change the exp rate of my stats?

item.title: How do I change the exp rate of my stats?
item.dc:creator: @needhoster needhoster
item.description:
@needhoster wrote:

[quote=“tonypker13, post:8, topic:242759”]Ohh wait, Nevermind. Search this;

TotalExp = (double)

You’ll see numerous codes like:

                        if (FightType == 1) // Accurate
                        {
                            TotalExp = (double) (70 * hitDiff);
                            TotalExp = (double) (TotalExp * CombatExpRate);
                            addSkillXP((int) (TotalExp), playerAttack);

See that 70 *? Change the number you have there to 14000000 on every code you see like that[/quote]okay found out thanks. If you can, please help with other post about how to make an NPC and how to make it talk.

Read full topic
item.source: How do I change the exp rate of my stats?

item.title: How do I change the exp rate of my stats?
item.dc:creator: @tonypker13 tonypker13
item.description:
@tonypker13 wrote:

Ohh wait, Nevermind. Search this;

TotalExp = (double)

You’ll see numerous codes like:

                        if (FightType == 1) // Accurate
                        {
                            TotalExp = (double) (70 * hitDiff);
                            TotalExp = (double) (TotalExp * CombatExpRate);
                            addSkillXP((int) (TotalExp), playerAttack);

See that 70 *? Change the number you have there to 14000000 on every code you see like that

Read full topic
item.source: How do I change the exp rate of my stats?

item.title: How do I change the exp rate of my stats?
item.dc:creator: @needhoster needhoster
item.description:
@needhoster wrote:

[quote=“tonypker13, post:6, topic:242759”][quote author=Kalphiter link=topic=319082.msg2528861#msg2528861 date=1226355423]

317 servers right?

If it is then, there is a switch statement for all the objects.

Find the object ID that adds X strength and search for “case XXXX:”
XXXX is the object ID…
[/quote]
That’s objects.

In order to change HIT exp, search

if (FightType == 1

And it starts there and keeps going on.[/quote]thats more better than other person but what do I do to it? How i make it so that first hit = 14m exp?

Read full topic
